DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the possibility of gait pattern change via visual feedback among patients with stroke. Also, the optimal visual feedback would be chosen from this study.
DOC.brief_title: Gait Control of Stroke Patients Using Visual Feedback
DOC.criteria: Hemiplegic stroke patients >= 18 years old Functional Ambulation Category >=3 Cognitively intact enough to follow the study protocol Adults without any gait problem Quadriplegic stroke patients Orthopedic problems to affect gait Underlying other neurological or psychological disorders Spasticity or contracture which impede the gait. Uncontrolled medical problems Pregnant.
